title: In version 10 pressing the volume button allowed user to choose speaker. Missing in 11.
content: I need to be able to select audio source so I can specify if sounds play on phone, hearing aids or on bluetooth speakers. Only allows when playing media. I also want to pick for notifications and system sounds. See Android 10 screen shot... no media playing.  Where is this in 11?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
